content: Hi @Mullai Murugan -- Sorry, my Zoom meeting dropped too soon, so not sure where it was left off. If you want to post links to your documents here, we can tag @John David Larkin Nolen and @Daniel Rutz here.

Here is the link to the document I shared today - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ubjqD_XzuN0kapc3Brd7EgBLXxT1t-cWfZyM7QLfXB8/edit
@Kevin Power @John David Larkin Nolen @Daniel Rutz
Excellent, thank you! @Rachel Kutner , here's today's info.
@Jamie Jones @Kevin Power have we incorporated this information and all other "recommendations" from eMerge into our current work to finalize the version of the IG which will go to ballot?
We have voted on several trackers related to feedback from EMERGE, but not everything in the document Mullai has linked. Were you wondering about something specific @Arthur Hermann ?

@Kevin Power We had agreed in a meeting that we would review all of the comments/suggestions and challenges highlighted by eMerge and address them. I am just asking if we have comprehensively done so. I know that we have some trackers regarding this... just confirming that we have addressed all of the items from eMerge.. perhaps @Mullai Murugan could take a look and confirm?

I can, unfortunately, confirm we have NOT fully addressed all of the feedback from eMERGE. Some of it is all rolled up in the discussion from above, so it will likely be addressed by the work being driven by O&O to handle complex reports. Other trackers are still in our 'backlog' (trackers logged but that have not yet been reviewed, proposals made, votes take, and change applied).
The other big one is guidance on where to include (sanger/etc) confirmation

We have a proposal for including it as a component, can go over it Monday. In context of our other observational properties that are currently logged as components (but could potentially be their own observations)
